text:
As you do something new
it progressively changes the fans' impressions.
Though I think that at some point it'll just become business as usual.

The fact that I'm part of 283Pro
will also become an everyday thing, I guess.
You're already an upstanding member of 283Pro, Mikoto.

Really?
I wonder if I'm fitting in alright.

Yeah. I'm sure you'll show me how well
you've integrated with everyone at the next live.

I'll show you...
No, "I've got to do it", right?
